sentences.english: This time, however, Chinese authorities in Hebei Province stepped forward and stopped the deal.
sentences.chinese: 但这一次，河北省的地方政府插手并阻止了这一交易。

sentences.english: This tune is a representative piece of Hebei folk instrumental music.
sentences.chinese: 此曲是河北民间器乐曲中具有代表性的作品之一。

sentences.english: This is the website of College of Life Science, Hebei University.
sentences.chinese: 这是河北大学生命科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: Hebei Jinbiao mesh Co. , Ltd. , is the production of highway fencing wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 栏河北金标网栏有限公司，是生产高速公路护栏网。

sentences.english: Studying on groundwater in Hebei Plain has been an academic focus all the time.
sentences.chinese: 河北平原地下水的研究一直以来都是学者关注的焦点。

sentences.english: It was discovered that the whole of Hebei plain show a descending tendency.
sentences.chinese: 整个河北平原都存在着下降的趋势。

sentences.english: Hebei Province in 1980 was named high-quality brand-name flavor of food.
sentences.chinese: 1980年又被评为河北省优质风味食品名牌产品。

sentences.english: Results 12 species, 1 genera were recognized in Hebei province.
sentences.chinese: 结果在河北省发现厕蝇科昆虫1属12种。

sentences.english: Sea Xingxian is located in Hebei Province, southeast of Shandong Province, neighboring the point of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 海兴县位于河北省东南部，邻山东省，濒渤海。

sentences.english: Great Wall in Hebei Province in 1908. He described the towers as jewels.
sentences.chinese: 1908年河北省长城，他形容一串炮楼像珠宝一样。

sentences.english: Hebei province is briefly named as Ji, with Shijiazhuang as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 河北省简称冀，省会城市是石家庄。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate species of the family Anthomyiidae in Hebei province of China.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查研究河北省花蝇科昆虫的种类。

sentences.english: Laboratory building in the intensity of investment in Hebei enterprises in one of veterinary drugs.
sentences.chinese: 实验室的建设投入的力度在河北兽药企业中数一数二。

sentences.english: Heng Shui Laobaigan is one of the most famous liquors in Hebei province and never goes to the head.
sentences.chinese: 衡水老白干是河北省最有名的白酒，而且喝了不上头。

sentences.english: Conclusion The complicated nature and geography enviroment decided complexity of Calliphoridae species.
sentences.chinese: 结论河北省复杂的自然地理环境决定丽蝇复杂的种类。

sentences.english: In the town, qinghe County, Hebei province, conduct tailored business enterprise more and more.
sentences.chinese: 在河北省清河县，开展量身定做业务的企业越来越多。
